title: Marijuana And Obesity
itunes:author: Mad Hat Economics
itunes:summary: In this episode we discuss the health implications of legalized marijuana for recreational use.  We found that, in the case of Colorado, BMI actually decreased despite the alleged 'munchies effect'.

description: In this episode we discuss the health implications of legalized marijuana for recreational use.  We found that, in the case of Colorado, BMI actually decreased despite the alleged 'munchies effect'.
